title: Basaglio
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Fusion, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Just a few dishes are offered and change on a daily basis. The meals are freshly prepared and cooked, are creative and seasonal. About 80% of the meals offered are veggie/vegan. Also offers coffee and sweets. (Started as a social project to help people with mental disorders.)
